property.name: hbase.rootdir
property.description: The directory shared by region servers. Should be fully-qualified to include the filesystem to use. E.g: hdfs://NAMENODE_SERVER:PORT/HBASE_ROOTDIR

property.name: hbase.cluster.distributed
property.description: The mode the cluster will be in. Possible values are false: standalone and pseudo-distributed setups with managed Zookeeper true: fully-distributed with unmanaged Zookeeper Quorum (see hbase-env.sh)

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Comma separated list of servers in the ZooKeeper Quorum. For example, "host1.mydomain.com,host2.mydomain.com,host3.mydomain.com". By default this is set to localhost for local and pseudo-distributed modes of operation. For a fully-distributed setup, this should be set to a full list of ZooKeeper quorum servers. If HBASE_MANAGES_ZK is set in hbase-env.sh this is the list of servers which we will start/stop ZooKeeper on.

property.name: hbase.tmp.dir
property.description: Temporary directory on the local filesystem.

property.name: hbase.master.port
property.description: The port master should bind to.

property.name: hbase.master.info.port
property.description: The port for the hbase master web UI Set to -1 if you do not want the info server to run.

property.name: hbase.regionserver.port
property.description: The port an HBase region server binds to.

property.name: hbase.regionserver.info.port
property.description: The port for the hbase regionserver web UI Set to -1 if you do not want the info server to run.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.leaderport
property.description: Port used by ZooKeeper for leader election. See http://hadoop.apache.org/zookeeper/docs/r3.1.1/zookeeperStarted.html#sc_RunningReplicatedZooKeeper for more information.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.peerport
property.description: Port used by ZooKeeper peers to talk to each other. See http://hadoop.apache.org/zookeeper/docs/r3.1.1/zookeeperStarted.html#sc_RunningReplicatedZooKeeper for more information.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort
property.description: Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The port at which the clients will connect.

property.name: hbase.rest.port
property.description: The port for the HBase REST server.

property.name: hbase.client.scanner.caching
property.description: Number of rows that will be fetched when calling next on a scanner if it is not served from memory. Higher caching values will enable faster scanners but will eat up more memory and some calls of next may take longer and longer times when the cache is empty.
